text: Peter Joseph Babando (May 10, 1925 â€“ February 19, 2020) was a Canadian ice hockey player. He played as a left winger. He played in the National Hockey League (NHL) for the Boston Bruins, Detroit Red Wings, Chicago Black Hawks and New York Rangers. In 1950, he won the Stanley Cup with the Detroit Red Wings. Babando was born in Lower Burrell, Pennsylvania, United States and grew up in Ontario. He died in Timmins, Ontario on February 19, 2020, at the age of 94. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1925 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Boston Bruins players Category:Canadian ice hockey left wingers Category:Chicago Blackhawks players Category:Detroit Red Wings players Category:Ice hockey people from Ontario Category:New York Rangers players Category:People from Timmins Category:Sportspeople from Pennsylvania Category:Stanley Cup champions
title: Pete Babando
